靫字的基本解释

靫
chá
〔鞴（
b坕 ）靫〕装箭的袋子，如“后军细铠甲，白羽攒靫靫。”

靫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chāi］［chā］
［《廣韻》楚佳切，平佳，初。］
［《廣韻》初牙切，平麻，初。］
(1)箭袋。
(2)泛指袋子。

靫字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　靫； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1385第04
【廣韻】楚佳切【集韻】【韻會】初佳切【正韻】初皆切，?音釵。【玉篇】箭室也。【埤蒼】鞲靫，箭室。　又【廣韻】初牙切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】初加切，?音叉。又【五音集韻】初刮切，音㔍。義?同。

靫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
靫字的起名意思

暂无。

靫
Basic explanation of words
靫
chá
〔Ying (
b (坕) 靫] a bag for holding arrows, such as "the thin armor of the rear army, the white feathers gather the 靫."
靫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chāi] [chā]
["Guang Yun" Chu Jiaqie, Ping Jia, Chu. ]
["Guangyun" first teeth cut, plain hemp, early. ]
(1) Quiver.
(2) Refers to the bag in general.
靫
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Leather Characters】　靫; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1385 Page 04
[Guang Yun] Chu Jiaqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] First good cut [Zheng Yun] All cut at the beginning,? Yin Chai. [Jade articles] Arrow room also. 【Pi Cang】Carassius auratus, arrow chamber.　[Guangyun] First tooth cut [Jiyun] [Rhyme] [Zhengyun] First cut,? Tuning fork. Also 【Pentagram Rhyme】First scrape and cut, sound 㔍. Righteous? Same.
